description: I specialize in building web and mobile applications, I like robust and scalable solutions through the JavaScript ecosystem, from robust APIs to Big Data pipelines and AI-powered features.
about_subtitle: Know a little more about my career and skills.
about_description_1: I'm a full stack developer passionate about creating technological solutions that make a difference. With more than 5 years of experience in the industry, I've worked on diverse projects from startups to established companies.
about_description_2: My focus is on writing clean, maintainable and scalable code, always seeking the best practices and the most appropriate technologies for each project. I love learning constantly and staying updated with the latest trends in web development.
contact_subtitle: Do you have a project in mind? Let's talk!
contact_description: If you have any project idea, want to collaborate or just want to say hello, don't hesitate to contact me. I'll do my best to respond as soon as possible.
